name: Brain Training 3D
summary:
Following on from the global phenomenon that was Dr. Kawashima’s Brain Training for the DS, we bring you a new brain training game now in glorious 3D! 
 
Both thinking power and memory skills can be improved for adults and children. The player will need to be thinking and memorising several kinds of items including numbers, colors, shapes and words within the 180 stages included. 
 
To get higher scores, shoot rapid bullets, one shot through multiple targets or devise smart ways and find hidden solutions. 
 
Brain Training 3D is a smart and fun brain training game for both adults and children alike! The simple shooting method mixed with challenging levels makes it easy for children to play and learn while also being engaging and testing adult brains. 
 
With 6 different level types training both memory and thinking power, cleverly designed to appeal to children, kids will not want to stop playing. The friendly little piggy character will guide your child through the game and both encourage and reward them when they are doing well.
